newsitem.title: USA: PCX to trade LEAPS on Xilinx from June 13.
newsitem.headline: PCX to trade LEAPS on Xilinx from June 13.

text.p: The Pacific Exchange said Wednesday it will begin trading LEAPS (Long Term Equity Anticipation Securities) on shares of Xilinx Inc on June 13.
The exchange said the LEAPS will expire in January 1999 and have initial strike prices of 35, 45 and 55.
Xilinx shares were down 2-1/16 at 45 Wednesday afternoon.
